channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Issue of Resident from 10 Daintry way E9 5JJ Graham Hawkins possibly tampering, storing items and going in cupboards in Daintry way block for a number of years since 2019 to 2022.The resident Graham Hawkins from number 10 Daintry way who has been going in and out Daintry way block Trowbridge estate cupboards,fiddling with things dressed inappropriately for someone who States they work for Hackney council to a resident who lives in the block. Possibly Hackney council new uniform.Graham Hawkins was wearing grey tracksuit bottoms, half naked bare chest man,flip-flops, tattoo on right upper arm shoulder and his wife's purple washing up gloves to hide his fingerprints with Hackney council keys. Graham Hawkins was An imposter is a person who pretends to be someone else such pretending to work for Hackney council to another resident in the block.reported to the metropolitan police safer neighborhood team Who seem to laugh when they see the pictures of imposter stating he works for the hackney council. police stated Graham Hawkins does not work for Hackney council dress like that and was laughing. Previously housing officer Simon Priscilla has stated the resident Graham Hawkins does not work for Hackney Council but in another breath another co-worker in the similar department ASB who goes by the name of Kathryn McHugh States Graham Hawkins does work for the council and cannot disclose that information. Hackney Council seem to be lying and covering anti-social behavior up protecting perpetrators. The local housing manager Denise corbin has been offloading her workload onto a resident Graham Hawkins unofficially working for hackney council doing Denise corbin job role and inspection job for her.possibly Denise corbin local manager can have the day off unofficially or stay in the office at Hillman Street hackney council for the day and not have to come down to the Trowbridge estate to do her inspections because Denise Corbin just has to pick up the phone and call her unofficial employee that Denise Corbyn uses for hackney council Graham Hawkins who lives nearby to ask him to do the inspection for housing manager Denise Corbin.in return housing manager turns a blind eye to resident Graham Hawkins behavior and anti-social behavior.Possibly Hackney council, corruption here. Which has not been investigated by Hackney council.This resident Graham Hawkins has been arrested by the metropolitan police because he was causing alarm and distressed to a resident,anti-social behavior. Graham Hawkins has a history of violence known to the police But the housing manager Denise Corbin unofficially is employing Graham Hawkins to do her job roll does Hackney council get the picture.if this is the case Denise Corbin is giving this resident Graham Hawkins permission,authorization as Graham Hawkins stated yes I work for the council to do Denise Corbin job role unofficially off the books only between two people knowing and enter the Daintry way block Trowbridge estate to cause alarm and distressed to another resident. The relationship between Graham Hawkins and the local aerial manager Denise corbin friends., 30th September
item.description:
Hackney council pick on vulnerable disabled and learning disability people and do not address antisocial behavior.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Reading Lane, Hackney, London

item.title: To whom it concerns. Could you please address these issues previously happened but not addressed antisocial behaviour criminal activity.A Residence of the Trowbridge estate Graham Hawkins has been breaking into Osborne road void garages since 2016 & 2023 rent free. Graham Hawkins breaking into void garages with a battery pack handle grinder.Residence, Leaseholders were disturbed by what Graham Hawkins was doing Which this behaviour should not be tolerated by hackney council & Randall Kerry garage team hand posted a warning letter to the address of Graham Hawkins 10 Dainty way E9 5JJ.Resident from 21 Mallard close E9 5JL Eugene Egan has been involved with the trespassing,assisting,helping Graham Hawkins move his stuff out of garage.when mr Graham Hawkins was breaking into the garage Eugene Egan was also aware of what Graham Hawkins was doing.Breaking and entering trespassing. Also on the night when Graham Hawkins was breaking into the garage 16,19,with a battery pack handle grinder. Eugene Egan approach mr Graham Hawkins and reply to Graham Hawkins the subcontractor purdys cut the lock and done that to you Graham and took your stuff out of garage 19 and put it into garage 16 and changed lock.Graham Hawkins was cutting the padlock off garage 16 with a battery handle grinder as Eugene Egan was there with Graham Hawkins On 01/08/23 at 20:00pm.Eugene Egan knows this information because he has a CCTV overlooking all of the leaseholders garages monitoring their daily routines and feeding information to Graham Hawkins. criminal behaviour was taken place. Eugene Egan has been tipping resident Graham Hawkins off about the void garages because it's a coincident how chair member knows which garages are empty,void and which ones are leased out seen as Eugene Egan works with the council official people he would know that sort of information.Hackney council put notice up on garage door to vacate garage 19,16 trespassing Graham Hawkins remove his stuff out of garage 16 and placed it into two garages which Eugene Egan has access and keys owns, leases from Hackney council which was 23 & 24 Osborne road garages subletting criminal activity, possibly garage tenancy fraud in different names.Eugene Egan help,assisting,perpetrator,trespasser resident Graham Hawkins remove his stuff into Eugene egan garages at 23 & 24 because the resident got caught and found out by the local hackney council garage team.Eugene Egan and Graham Hawkins should not be in that garage without the hackney councils authorization,criminal activity, trespassing.Shows the connections with one another how Trowbridge resident association chair member looks out for Graham Hawkins.criminal behaviour.Tra corruption. This was reported to the metropolitan police. Residence and other Leaseholders pay their rent so why should this one or two residents get away with breaking into garages rent free for a number of years this is discrimination and antisocial behavior. If somebody could please address this behavior and investigate., 30th September

item.title: Dumped rubbish near bin. There has been a fire here recently & it’s where kids play, 30th September
item.description:
Constant dumping of rubbish & fly tipping & dangerous building waste on Blackstone estate for the last two years. There had been a fire in the overflowing bins recently. There is also a rat and fox problem that is attracted by the waste.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Elmbridge Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A victim of car robberies belongings and items discarded out her stolen vehicle in Merriam Ave, garages out the site of commissioners camera. Why are the council and the mayor and the commissioner of the metropolitan police allowing this to happen antisocial behavior., 30th September
item.description:
Your local authority do not care about robbery or fifth or criminal activity they let it happen to innocent residents and Leaseholders on a daily basis they don't care long as they get their rent and money in this world they don't care.

item.title: Green household bin dumped full of waste, 30th September
item.description:
I have reported this before. Fix my street informed me that the case is closed and has been dealt with. It is still there and has been for over 8 weeks. It is on the grass verge at Albion road on the corner of Townley road. It is tucked up against the fence and can be missed if looking to quickly

item.description:
